content:
any yarn will work with for this with matching hook size pictured is steel hook size 6 and 10 crochet thread available on ravely with two other baby lace edges for 3 75 pictured the large loop baby lace pattern **if you like my blog and the free patterns and tutorials and want to say thank you i have a wish list on ravelry of patterns i would like to make
thank you in advance for being kind and
saying thank you back

love sunshine but please do not feel like you have to**
